name: Lentil Salad With Tomatoes
recipeIngredient: 2 sprigs fresh thyme or 1/2 teaspoon dried
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
4 ripe plum tomatoes, cored and cut into small cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Combine lentils, onion-clove, carrots, thyme, bay leaf, salt, pepper and water in saucepan. Bring to boil and simmer for 20 minutes or until tender. Don't overcook. Drain.
Remove and discard the onion, thyme and bay leaf. Drain.
Transfer lentils to salad bowl and add chopped onions, garlic, vinegar, oil, tomatoes, salt and pepper. Toss well and sprinkle with parsley.
